snippet: A three-judge federal panel wants the Texas primaries to remain in April and is ordering redistricting negotiations between minority rights groups and the state to continue.
abstract: Three-judge federal panel wants the Texas primaries to remain in April and is ordering redistricting negotiations between minority rights groups and the state to continue.
lead_paragraph: A three-judge federal panel wants the Texas primaries to remain in April and is ordering redistricting negotiations between minority rights groups and the state to continue.

headline.seo: Texas: More Talks Ordered on Redistricting
headline.main: Texas: More Talks Ordered on Redistricting
